page.title: 10My Grandad's Daily Routine.
page.content: My grandfather usually gets up at 8.30 a.m. has some toast and a cup of tea then goes to sit on the seat with his former workmates. He talks about the 1960's when he used to work in the Washery. At 12 0'clock we all have dinner. After dinner he gets coal, chops wood and lights the fire then watches T.V. If it is fine he'll go into the garden and do some gardening. At 4.20 he has tea then cuts the grass or does some gardening. At 8.50 he goes home and at 9.30 he has some toast for supper watches T.V. and is in bed by 11 o'clock.
